description.value:
Trigger A creature enters the shaft leading to area C8

Effect Storm clouds roiling with gouts of fire, bolts of lightning, and the wails of uncountable souls form in the distance. The hazard then rolls initiative.

details.description: An endless void stretches in all directions. Visions of Golarion's destruction roll like storm clouds across the space.
details.disable: @Check[acrobatics|dc:47] to Fly through the space without becoming stuck in the webs, @Check[athletics|dc:50] to Climb the webs and make progress forward through the infinite, @Check[nature|dc:47] or @Check[occultism|dc:47] or @Check[arcana|dc:50] or @Check[religion|dc:50] (legendary) to collapse the extradimensional space, or @Check[perception|dc:52] to peer through the visions of Golarion to notice discrepancies that help keep the overwhelming despair from setting in; six successes disables the hazard, causing it to vanish forever and shunting all creatures to Liralarue's Prison.

publication.title: Pathfinder Adventure Path #220: Crypt of Runes

details.reset: The hazard resets automatically once no creatures are in the area.
details.routine:
(1 action) (arcane, emotion, illusion, mental) A stormfront filled with illusory scenes of Golarion's destruction rolls through the extradimensional space. Each creature in the hazard's area takes @Damage[6d12[mental]] damage (@Check[will|dc:42|basic|traits:arcane,emotion,illusion,mental] save). On a failed save, a creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Doomed]{Doomed 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Doomed]{Doomed 2} on a critical failure). A PC reduced to 0 Hit Points by this damage is shunted back into area C7.

A creature that takes damage while Climbing the webs must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:40] save or fall. A creature can try to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Grab an Edge] (@Check[reflex|dc:40]). On a success, they lose one success they've earned to escape the hazard but otherwise arrest their fall. On a failure, they plummet into the void, losing all Athletics successes they've earned to escape the hazard. Each round on their turn, the character can try to Grab an Edge again, but each time they fail to do so, the party must earn an additional success to escape the hazard. Characters who fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Unconscious] or repeatedly fail to Grab an Edge might effectively become lost in the void, though once the nightmare hazard is disabled, they appear along with the rest of the PCs in Liralarue's Prison.
